name: Sensor Web Server Helgoland API v3.3.0
body:
Available in [Maven Central](https://search.maven.org/search?q=g:org.n52.sensorweb-server.helgoland%20and%20v:3.3.0).

## Change Log 
* Support for feature hierarchy(#522)
  * get feature hierarchy on `/features` endpoint by defining `expanded=true` and `level=0..x`. Level value can be empty or a number defining up to which level the featues should be returned.
  *  `level` can be used on all endpoints whne querying entites for a parent feature.
* Add `aggregation` query parameter and output for `/datasets` to get min/max/count and average values for a dataset in expanded view.

### Dependency Updates
* Bump geotools.version from 23.1 to 23.2 (#523)

### Breaking Changes
* None

See [here](https://github.com/52North/sensorweb-server-helgoland/compare/v3.21...v3.3.0) for the complete commit log.
